page.title: 05Folk Customs
page.content: {Daresbury Walking Day The procession walks from the Hall to school and then to the church for a service. The band leads but there is a banner in front. There are groups attending like the Young Wives, W.I., Sunday School children, Cubs ,Scouts and Brownies. After the service there are races and refreshments at the Hall {Hatton Rose Queen It is a festival event and has gone on for eight years. The Mayoress comes and crowns the Queen. Then the other one retires. We have a display by some dogs and races and refreshments. {Hatton Bonfire Night} The children of the village collect wood and build a bonfire with it. The grownups make cakes and drinks and toffee apples. When we light the bonfire people let fireworks off and have fun.
